query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `merchant_subscriptions` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
  `merchant_id` int NOT NULL,
  `plan_id` int,
  `status` enum('trial', 'active', 'expired', 'cancelled') NOT NULL,
  `billing_cycle` enum('monthly', 'yearly') NOT NULL,
  `start_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `end_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `trial_ends_at` timestamp,
  `auto_renew` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `cancelled_at` timestamp,
  `cancellation_reason` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_merchant_id_idx` (`merchant_id`),
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_plan_id_idx` (`plan_id`),
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_end_date_idx` (`end_date`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`merchant_id`) REFERENCES `merchants`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`plan_id`) REFERENCES `subscription_plans`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
command:

  `merchant_id` int NOT NULL,
  `plan_id` int,
  `status` enum('trial', 'active', 'expired', 'cancelled') NOT NULL,
  `billing_cycle` enum('monthly', 'yearly') NOT NULL,
  `start_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `end_date` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `trial_ends_at` timestamp,
  `auto_renew` tinyint NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `cancelled_at` timestamp,
  `cancellation_reason` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_merchant_id_idx` (`merchant_id`),
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_plan_id_idx` (`plan_id`),
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_status_idx` (`status`),
  INDEX `merchant_subscriptions_end_date_idx` (`end_date`),
  FOREIGN KEY (`merchant_id`) REFERENCES `merchants`(`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  FOREIGN KEY (`plan_id`) REFERENCES `subscription_plans`(`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL
);
